Posts.Content: First you may find this presentation helpful A Good Life with Cancer You may need to get some treatment to put the disease in a dormant state. Next it is recommended to study mediation and follow a good diet to keep it a a dormant state. Moderator comment: I have removed the link(s) directing to site(s) unsuitable for inclusion in the forums. If users want this information please use the Private Message service to request the details. Report Reply
Posts.Title: Terrified I have breast cancer
